name: ESTATE OF Joseph H. CHADWICK, Deceased. Appeal of Robert E. Chadwick, Jennifer L. Chadwick and Thelma C. White

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: ESTATE OF Joseph H. CHADWICK, Deceased. Appeal of Robert E. Chadwick, Jennifer L. Chadwick and Thelma C. White.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 9th day of April 2001, the appeal in the above captioned case is dismissed as improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Mary Wade Myers, Philadelphia, for appellants, Robert Chadwick and Thelma White.
Albert M. Sardella, Coatesville, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
768 A.2d 1105
ESTATE OF Joseph H. CHADWICK, Deceased. Appeal of Robert E. Chadwick, Jennifer L. Chadwick and Thelma C. White.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 30, 2001.
Decided April 9, 2001.
Mary Wade Myers, Philadelphia, for appellants, Robert Chadwick and Thelma White.
Albert M. Sardella, Coatesville, for appellee.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
